540220.name: AIRHEART - The Original Soundtrack
540220.description:
It's the Soundtrack of AIRHEART - Tales of broken Wings, in "224kbps MP3's" format. Six Tracks in a beautiful 38 Minutes EP soundscape.

If you like the Music of Airheart, please consider getting the OST to and directly support Michel Barengo for his fantastic work.

Please Note: once purchased, the bonus content will appear in the game's root installation directory.
